message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I think you'll be very pleased with this purchase!
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my best offer and reflects a fair price for both of us.
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
